original_text: The Amalekites and the Canaanites will be there in front of you. They will kill you with their swords. That will happen because you have refused to obey the Lord. So the Lord will not be with you to help you.’
korean_text: 아말렉인과 가나안인이 너희 앞에 있으니 너희가 그 칼에 망하리라 너희가 여호와를 배반하였으니 여호와께서 너희와 함께 하지 아니하시리라 하나

sentences.original_text: will be there in front of you
They will kill you with their swords
because you have refused to obey the Lord
So the Lord will not be with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주께서 너와 함께 계시지 않을 것이다
